column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////When I came with one other person
column2: we split a small size (serves 2) with half of their Classic and half "The Lou." We enjoyed the food and thought it was definitely good pizza
column3: but for the size and $20 in addition to waiting 45 minutes for the pizza to come out
column4: it probably isn't always the best option. I strongly suggest it for the experience but am not sure I would come back again.
